hero.title:
Welcome to
PT. Sinergi Cahaya Utama Indah
hero.description: Social Entrepreneurship to inspire cross-sector collaboration to create positive social impact and prosperity for future generations.

getStarted.title: Company Philosophy - Synergy of Profitability and Humanity
getStarted.description1: PT SCUI holds the philosophy that the management of productive waqf funds must be directed to create sustainable economic growth, while maintaining the core value of trust that must not be diminished.
getStarted.description2: In the journey towards becoming a social enterprise-based venture capital company, SCUI invests strategically in businesses that not only promise financial returns, but also bring positive social impact to Indonesian society.

consultation.title: Get Consultation
consultation.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about available services and cooperation opportunities.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional services we provide to support the productive waqf ecosystem and community empowerment

wakaf.title: Productive Waqf Management
wakaf.description: Professionally managing waqf funds to increase asset value sustainably without reducing the principal waqf funds.

pemberdayaan.title: Community Empowerment
pemberdayaan.description: Empowerment programs such as UMKM carts, clean water well drilling, and solar panel installations for communities.

kemitraan.title: Strategic Partnerships
kemitraan.description: Building partnerships with state-owned enterprises and private companies for infrastructure and development projects.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Three main business units of PT SCUI in managing productive waqf funds

investment.title: INVESTMENT
investment.description: PT SCUI's investment business unit focuses on managing productive waqf funds with the aim of increasing asset value sustainably without reducing the principal waqf funds. Current largest investment: PT Kembar Jaya Abadi for Mechanical Electrical work at state-owned enterprise PT Kereta Api Properti Manajemen (KAPM).

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: PT SCUI's Services business unit provides various professional services that support the needs of the Lembaga Wakaf Nurul Taqwa (LWNT) and ZIS Indosat ecosystem and supports the operational activities of other productive businesses. SCUI works on several Zakat, Infaq, and Sedaqah fund distribution projects from ZIS Indosat for community empowerment.

trading.title: TRADING
trading.description: Trading of strategic goods and commodities to support economic growth and community empowerment in Indonesia.

features.title: Company Highlights
features.subtitle: Four main focuses that make PT SCUI a leading social enterprise in productive waqf management

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.subtitle: Portfolio of investment, service, and trading projects of PT SCUI in managing productive waqf funds

clients.title: Clients & Business Partners
clients.subtitle: PT SCUI is proud to work with various clients and strategic partners in developing a sustainable business ecosystem

ecosystem.title: Partnership Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: PT SCUI is an integral part of the social-economic ecosystem in the Indosat environment that operates with sustainability and empowerment principles

blog.title: Latest News & Articles
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest developments in SCUI projects and activities in managing productive waqf funds

consultation.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about available services and cooperation opportunities.

investment.title: Investment
investment.description: Strategic investment in various sectors to increase waqf asset value sustainably without reducing principal funds.

generalServices.title: General Services
generalServices.description: Professional services to support LWNT and ZIS Indosat ecosystem, including social fund distribution and SME empowerment.

trading.title: Trading
trading.description: Trading of strategic goods and commodities to support economic growth and community empowerment in Indonesia.

investment.title: INVESTMENT
investment.description: PT SCUI's investment business unit focuses on managing productive waqf funds with the aim of increasing asset value sustainably without reducing the principal waqf funds. Currently the largest investment run by SCUI is in PT Kembar Jaya Abadi for Mechanical Electrical work at state-owned enterprise PT Kereta Api Properti Manajemen (KAPM).

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: PT SCUI's Services business unit provides various professional services that support the needs of the Lembaga Wakaf Nurul Taqwa (LWNT) and ZIS Indosat ecosystem and supports the operational activities of other productive businesses. SCUI works on several Zakat, Infaq, and Sedaqah fund distribution projects from ZIS Indosat for community empowerment.

trading.title: TRADING
trading.description: Trading of strategic goods and commodities to support economic growth and community empowerment in Indonesia.

visionContent.point1: • To become the leading social enterprise company that has a positive impact on humanity for Indonesia.
visionContent.point2: • To become a leading social enterprise company that contributes to community economic empowerment through sustainable business innovation.
visionContent.point3: • To become a catalyst for social and environmental change by optimizing productive waqf potential professionally and transparently.
visionContent.point4: • To inspire cross-sector collaboration to create positive social impact and prosperity for future generations.

missionContent.point1: • Building an excellent social enterprise organization in business that impacts stakeholders.
missionContent.point2: • Managing productive waqf funds safely and sustainably to ensure asset growth and benefits for society in the future.
missionContent.point3: • Creating a business ecosystem oriented towards social and environmental welfare without sacrificing profitability principles.
missionContent.point4: • Building strategic partnerships with various parties to expand social impact and increase value for stakeholders.

socialEnterprise.title: Leading Social Enterprise Company
socialEnterprise.subtitle: PT SCUI combines profitability with positive social impact, creating sustainable value for all stakeholders.
socialEnterprise.point1: Business that prioritizes social and environmental impact
socialEnterprise.point3: Sustainable business innovation for community empowerment

wakafProduktif.title: Professional Productive Waqf Management
wakafProduktif.subtitle: Managing waqf funds with principles of trust, transparency, and sustainability for long-term asset growth.
wakafProduktif.point1: Safe and sustainable waqf fund management
wakafProduktif.point3: Increasing asset value without reducing principal waqf funds
wakafProduktif.point4: Full transparency and accountability to stakeholders

kemitraanBumn.title: Strategic Partnership with State-Owned Enterprises
kemitraanBumn.subtitle: Building strategic partnerships with state-owned enterprises and national private companies to expand social and economic impact.
kemitraanBumn.point1: Experience partnering with PT Kereta Api Properti Manajemen (KAPM)
kemitraanBumn.point2: Cooperation with PT Berkah Industri Mesin Angkat (PT Pelindo)
kemitraanBumn.point3: Track record of Ministry of Law and Human Rights and national infrastructure projects

transparansi.title: Transparency and Professionalism
transparansi.subtitle: Operating with good corporate governance standards and full accountability.
transparansi.point1: Balanced management structure with 3 commissioners and 3 directors
transparansi.point2: Effective strategic oversight and operational implementation
transparansi.point3: Commitment to professionalism in carrying out productive waqf trust
